```{r}
# Load the file
load("/Users/wangjiayu/Downloads/wage1_v3.RData")

# Check object names
ls()

# Use the correct object name
x1 <- Data$educ
x2 <- Data$exper
x3 <- Data$tenure
y <- log(Data$wage)

# Create dataframe and run the model
data_perfect <- data.frame(x1, x2, x3, y)
model_perfect <- lm(y ~ x1 + x2 + x3, data = data_perfect)
summary(model_perfect)
```
